name: atom-ide-diagnostics-ui
description: Displays linter results, useful information, and problems with your code
author: Nuclide : Diagnostics

showDiagnosticTraces.title: Show full diagnostic traces
showDiagnosticTraces.description: Shows full trace information in diagnostics.

showDirectoryColumn.title: Show the Path column in the diagnostics table
showDirectoryColumn.description: The file's directory can give more context but is often unnecessary.

autoVisibility.title: Automatically show and hide diagnostics panel
autoVisibility.description: When new warnings appear, show the panel. When all warnings clear, hide it.
